Name: Sales
Description:
Contains the statistics overview of all sales in the period from 01.01.2011 to 31.12.2013.

The OrderDate indicates the receipt of an order. The DateKey indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue. Therefore the DateKey is the decisive date for revenue calculations.

Datasource: NAV Table [SalesExampleTable]

Name: SUM Sales
Description:
Sum of the amounts that have been invoiced (in CHF). When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: SUM Sales LY
Description:
Sum of the amounts that have been invoiced (in CHF). Refers to the selected time period and represents the value for the same time period in the previous year. When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: NUM of Stores
Description:
Number of stores that generated sales in the period under consideration. When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: AVG Sales per Store
Description:
Average sales amount (in CHF) per store, which generated sales in the period under consideration. When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: % Sales from Onlineshop
Description:
Share of sales of invoiced orders, which originated from the sales channel “Onlineshop” in %. When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: SUM Sales Onlineshop
Description:
Sum of the amounts that have been invoiced (in CHF) and originated from the sales channel "Onlineshop". When filtering by date, the DateKey is used, which indicates the day on which an order was processed and turned into a revenue.

Filters:
- Date (day)
- Chanel
- PromotionChanged
- Product
- Stores

Name: SalesKey
Description: Primary Key of the sales table. One invoiced order consists of one or multiple rows (SalesKeys) in the sales table.

Name: channelKey
Description: Secondary Key, which links the sales table to the DIM channel table. Specifies from which sales channel the invoiced order originated from.

Name: UnitCost
Description: Defines the cost in CHF of one unit of the corresponding product.

Name: UnitPrice
Description: Defines the sales price in CHF of one unit of the corresponding product.

Name: SalesAmount
Description: Defines the amount of revenue in CHF resulting from a specific invoiced order. It is calculated by multiplying the ordered amount by the sales price of the corresponding product.
